title: Silver Dollar Assignment
info: For this assignment, a few tests need to be graded manually.

tests.name: Game starts with random coin positions
tests.descr: Game has been restarted multiple times and coins are randomly allocated every single time.

tests.name: dragCoin_InitialCoinDrag_ShouldMoveWithMouse(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged: First coin can be dragged (not testing if can be dropped).

tests.name: dragCoin_SubsequentMove_ShouldMoveWithMouse(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged: Second coin can be dragged (not testing if can be dropped).

tests.name: dragCoin_LeftToLeftMultipleSquares_ShouldMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged multiple squares: Left coin should be able to be moved multiple squares to the left.

tests.name: dragCoin_RightToLeftMultipleSquares_ShouldMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged multiple squares: Right coin should be able to be moved multiple squares to the left.

tests.name: dropCoin_InitialCoinDrop_ShouldMoveBackToPlace(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Dropped coins end up centered in correct location: Coin should be positioned in the same place after dropping back to its starting point.

tests.name: dropCoin_SubsequentDrop_ShouldMoveBackToPlace(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Dropped coins end up centered in correct location: A second coin should be positioned in the same place after dropping back to its starting point.

tests.name: dropCoin_SameLocationCentered_ShouldBeCentered(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Dropped coins end up centered in correct location: Test that a coin picked up, slightly moved, and dropped in its original space centers itself on drop.

tests.name: dropCoin_LegalNewSpaceCentered_ShouldBeCentered(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Dropped coins end up centered in correct location: Test that a coin picked up, moved to a legal space, and dropped is centered on the square..

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalLeftToRightEmpty_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Checks that the user cannot move the left coin one square to the right in an empty square.

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalLeftOnTopRight_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Check that the user cannot move the left coin on top of the right coin.

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalLeftPastRight_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Check that the left coin cannot move past the right coin.

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalRightToRightEmpty_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Check that a right coin cannot move to the right one square.

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalRightOnTopLeft_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Check that the right coin cannot go on top of the left coin.

tests.name: makeMove_IllegalRightPastLeft_ShouldNotMove(silverdollar.Autograder)
tests.descr: Illegal moves are not allowed: Check that the right coin should not be able to move past left coin.
